attributes.action: Restrict banks from no-longer offering free banking services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the fact that the 5 main banks have made over a 40 billion pound profit in the last year using public money, we find it unacceptable that they now wish to make a charge to their customers to manage their accounts and therefore increase their profits even more for their shareholders.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/banking-free/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
